CREATE_TABLE: CREATE TABLE user (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, username TEXT UNIQUE NOT NULL, email TEXT UNIQUE NOT NULL, password_hash TEXT NOT NULL, first_name TEXT, last_name TEXT, created_at DATETIME, updated_at DATETIME)
INSERT: INSERT INTO user (username, email, password_hash, first_name, last_name, created_at, updated_at) VALUES ($username, $email, $password_hash, $first_name, $last_name, $created_at, $updated_at)
UPDATE: UPDATE user SET username = $username, email = $email, password_hash = $password_hash, first_name = $first_name, last_name = $last_name, updated_at = $updated_at WHERE id = $id
